column5: Hi guys I'm wondering if there are any spots with open water in burlington/hamilton area that I could fish at tomorrow after school for whatever bites.  Anyone know if the carp trap at cootes paradise is open or did that freeze over this year with the "polar vortex" as well?  Thanks a lot Matt.
Edit also i live in burlington and i drove to oakville bronte a few days ago some open water but it seemed way too muddy and fast for fishing?
